text:
If you use <cvs> tag and have cvs.exe in %PATH%, ant can not find it 
if "cvs.exe" is located in directory with spaces in name, for 
example "C:\Program Files\GNU\WinCvs 1.2\"
creator: myakovlev@intellij.net
sbailliez@apache.org
text:
Closing this bug as fixed since I don't have such behavior with Ant 1.6.2 and 
Sun JDK 1.4.2_06-b03 and 1.5.0-b64
